18: בְּשַׂ֤ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>the flesh</n> גִּבּוֹרִים֙ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>of the mighty</n> תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>Ye shall eat</n> וְדַם־ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <sup>5387 </sup> <n>of the princes</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> תִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> אֵילִ֨ים <sup>352 </sup> <n>of rams</n> כָּרִ֤ים <sup>3733 </sup> <n>of lambs</n> וְעַתּוּדִים֙ <sup>6260 </sup> <n>and of goats</n> פָּרִ֔ים <sup>6499 </sup> <n>of bullocks</n> מְרִיאֵ֥י <sup>4806 </sup> <n>all of them fatlings</n> בָשָׁ֖ן <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> כֻּלָּֽם׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n>
19: וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>And ye shall eat</n> חֵ֣לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>fat</n> לְשָׂבְעָ֔ה <sup>7654 </sup> <n>till ye be full</n> וּשְׁתִ֥יתֶם <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> דָּ֖ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> לְשִׁכָּר֑וֹן <sup>7943 </sup> <n>till ye be drunken</n> מִזִּבְחִ֖י <sup>2077 </sup> <n>of my sacrifice</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> זָבַ֥חְתִּי <sup>2076 </sup> <n>which I have sacrificed</n> לָכֶֽם׃
20: וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֤ם <sup>7646 </sup> <n>Thus ye shall be filled</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> שֻׁלְחָנִי֙ <sup>7979 </sup> <n>at my table</n> ס֣וּס <sup>5483 </sup> <n>with horses</n> וָרֶ֔כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and chariots</n> גִּבּ֖וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>with mighty men</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and with all men</n> מִלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n>
21: וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כְּבוֹדִ֖י <sup>3519 </sup> <n>my glory</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> וְרָא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>and all the heathen</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִשְׁפָּטִי֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>my judgment</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשִׂ֔יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that I have executed</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָדִ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and my hand</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שַׂ֥מְתִּי <sup>7760 </sup> <n>that I have laid</n> בָהֶֽם׃
22: וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>So the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>that</n> הַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>from that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וָהָֽלְאָה׃ <sup>1973 </sup> <n>and forward</n>
23: וְיָדְע֣וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> הַ֠גּוֹיִם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>And the heathen</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בַעֲוֹנָ֞ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>for their iniquity</n> גָּל֣וּ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>went into captivity</n> בֵֽית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>that the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> מָֽעֲלוּ־ <sup>4603 </sup> <n>because they trespassed</n> בִ֔י וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>against me therefore hid</n> פָּנַ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>I my face</n> מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וָֽאֶתְּנֵם֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>from them and gave</n> בְּיַ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into the hand</n> צָרֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6862 </sup> <n>of their enemies</n> וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>so fell</n> בַחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>they all by the sword</n> כֻּלָּֽם׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n>
24: כְּטֻמְאָתָ֥ם <sup>2932 </sup> <n>According to their uncleanness</n> וּכְפִשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>and according to their transgressions</n> עָשִׂ֣יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have I done</n> אֹתָ֑ם <sup>853 </sup> וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>unto them and hid</n> פָּנַ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> מֵהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> ס
25: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> עַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> אָשִׁיב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Now will I bring again</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֣וּת <sup>7622 </sup> <n>captive</n> ק) יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and have mercy</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon the whole house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וְקִנֵּאתִ֖י <sup>7065 </sup> <n>and will be jealous</n> לְשֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>for my holy</n>
26: וְנָשׂוּ֙ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>After that they have borne</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <sup>3639 </sup> <n>their shame</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מַעֲלָ֖ם <sup>4603 </sup> <n>whereby they have trespassed</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מָעֲלוּ־ <sup>4604 </sup> <n>and all their trespasses</n> בִ֑י בְּשִׁבְתָּ֧ם <sup>3427 </sup> <n>against me when they dwelt</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אַדְמָתָ֛ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>in their land</n> לָבֶ֖טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>safely</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>and none made [them] afraid</n>
27: בְּשׁוֹבְבִ֤י <sup>7725 </sup> <n>When I have brought them again</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>from the people</n> וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gathered</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> מֵֽאַרְצ֖וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>lands</n> אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>them out of their enemies'</n> וְנִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <sup>6942 </sup> <n>and am sanctified</n> בָ֔ם לְעֵינֵ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in them in the sight</n> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of many</n>
28: וְיָדְע֗וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Then shall they know</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> בְּהַגְלוֹתִ֤י <sup>1540 </sup> <n>which caused them to be led into captivity</n> אֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>among</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> וְכִנַּסְתִּ֖ים <sup>3664 </sup> <n>but I have gathered</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>their own</n> אַדְמָתָ֑ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>them unto their own land</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>none</n> אוֹתִ֥יר <sup>3498 </sup> <n>and have left</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>any</n> מֵהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>of them</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
29: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אַסְתִּ֥יר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>Neither will I hide</n> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>any</n> פָּנַ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> מֵהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> שָׁפַ֤כְתִּי <sup>8210 </sup> <n>any more from them for I have poured out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רוּחִי֙ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>my spirit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> פ
